title: Amma Amma Song Lyrics Uzhaippali
stanzas:
Amma Amma Song Lyrics Uzhaipali
#Ilaiyaraja #SPB #Vaali
Amma ammaa
endhan aaryuyire
kannin maniye..
dheivam neeye oh oh oh..

Amma ammaa
endhan aaryuyire
naanum neeyum
endrum orr uyire.
iru kannin maniye oh oh..
dheivam neeye oh oh..

poovizhi oram
orr thuli neerum
nee vadithaal
manam thaangaathu.

pon mugam konjam
vaadi nindraalum
naan thudippaen
vali thaazhaadhu

paththu maasam sumandhu
patta paadum marandhu
pillai selvam pirakka
alli kayyil edukka

Amma ammaa
endhan aaryuyire
naanum neeyum
endrum orr uyire.

nalla kaalam pirakka
unnai naanum arindhen
undhan kangal thirakka
ingu paadal padithaen
